features.additionalInfo: Add up to 3 additional cardholders for free.
Balance transfer your non-Bankwest credit card balances. Conditions apply.
You can use BPAY  to quickly and easily pay your bills online.
Get bonus points every year you meet the minimum spend requirements. To earn Annual Bonus Points you must have a minimum credit limit of $3,000.
Access and activate your new card digitally as soon as it's approved.
You can do your everyday banking through Bankwest Online Banking and the Bankwest App from anywhere, 24/7 - it's easy and secure.

If you want to access your account in Online Business Banking, you will be provided with a separate Product Disclosure Statement and your use of the service will be a matter of separate agreement with us. Separate fees are applicable for this service.
Use Apple Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Apple device.
Use Fitbit Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Fitbit watch/tracker device.
Use Garmin Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Garmin watch/tracker device.
Use Google Pay  from any compatible Android device to tap and pay on the go
Use Samsung Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Samsung device.

Up to 44 interest free days on purchases. You qualify for interest free days on purchases if you pay the closing balance owing (excluding any balance transfer amount) on your current statement in full by the due date.
Earn reward points for spending on eligible purchases, every single year. Points can be redeemed for cash back to your credit card.
Earn 1.5 More Rewards points per $1 spent on eligible purchases. Total points earned each year is 150,000 (including bonus points).
Use Easy Alerts to keep track of your banking by setting up customisable notifications that let you know about important activities on your account, such as credit card repayment reminder.
You can bank over the phone.
Spread the cost of up to 5 eligible purchases between $100 and $10000 over 4 monthly instalments at 0% p.a. Available to eligible customers via the Bankwest App only. Terms and conditions apply.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Bankwest More Classic Mastercard is an account for personal customers who are over 18 years of age.
The Bankwest More Classic Mastercard is an account for personal customers who are Australian permanent residents.
The Bankwest More Classic Mastercard is an account for personal customers who are over 18 years of age.
For lending products, lending criteria apply.

fees.name: Late Payment Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each statement period that the minimum payment is not processed to your card account by the due date.

fees.name: Notice of Demand Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we issue a notice of demand to you.

fees.name: Balance Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged as a % of the total balance transfer transaction amount. Payable for each transaction that the introductory balance transfer percentage rate applies to.

fees.name: Customer Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time we have to locate you during the period that you're in default under the card contract.

fees.name: Credit Card Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on reissue of a lost credit card over the entitled two free reissues per Card Account per calendar year. This fee does not apply to stolen cards when Bankwest is advised of the police report identification number.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each paper Card Account Statement sent to you. Fee is waived if opted-in to e-statements.

fees.name: Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when the Card Account is opened and in advance on each anniversary of Card Account opening.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Foreign transactions are transaction occurring outside of Australia whether in foreign currency or Australian dollars including if you are in Australia (for example, online) where the merchant or the financial institution or entity processing the transaction is located overseas.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 2% of transaction amount or $4 (whichever is greater). Payable for transactions that the annual cash advance percentage rate applies to.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: 0% p.a. for the first 6 months after your Card is approved for the balance you transfer (excluding Bankwest Card conversion transfers), reverting to a 19.99% p.a. after promotional balance transfer rate (1% balance transfer fee applies).

data.name: Bankwest More Classic Mastercard
data.description: An everyday credit card that rewards you for spending on eligible purchases.
